actions.name: Overwhelm
actions.description: Effect: Fairy-Type creatures resist the user's Dragon-Type Attacks by one step rather than gaining immune. The user cannot be afflicted with the @Affliction[fear] Affliction.

system.description: Effect: Fairy-Type creatures resist the user's Dragon-Type Attacks by one step rather than being immune. The user cannot be afflicted with the @Affliction[fear] Affliction.
